text: The 2018–19 Liga IV Hunedoara is the 51st season of the Liga IV Hunedoara, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 8 September 2019 and ended on 2 June 2019. == Team changes == ===To Liga IV Hunedoara=== Relegated from Liga III * — Promoted from Liga V Hunedoara * — ===From Liga IV Hunedoara=== Promoted to Liga III * Hunedoara Relegated to Liga V Hunedoara * — ===Other changes=== * Hercules Lupeni withdrew from Liga IV and dissolved. * Aurul Certej dropped out from the Liga IV and enrolled in Liga V. ==League table== ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2018–19 Liga I * 2018–19 Liga II * 2018–19 Liga III * 2018–19 Liga IV ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2018–19 Liga IV Alba * 2018–19 Liga IV Arad * 2018–19 Liga IV Argeș * 2018–19 Liga IV Bihor * 2018–19 Liga IV Galați * 2018–19 Liga IV Mureș * 2018–19 Liga IV Neamț * 2018–19 Liga IV Olt * 2018–19 Liga IV Prahova * 2018–19 Liga IV Suceava * 2018–19 Liga IV Teleorman * 2018–19 Liga IV Timiș * 2018–19 Liga IV Vâlcea * 2018–19 Liga IV Vaslui ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Liga IV seasons Category:Sport in Hunedoara County
title: 2018–19 Liga IV Hunedoara
